summary: The diff adds a Motoko backend actor and a React+TS frontend with routing, Internet Identity auth hooks/components, cart/checkout/orders pages, and a warm neutral Tailwind theme. However, the backend seeding appears to include only a single product (not the required 6+), and the backend product model uses `title` instead of the required `name`. Some requested assets/features cannot be confirmed due to truncation/omitted files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Seed at least 6 products on fresh deploy so the UI can be demonstrated without manual entry.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend shows only a single seeded product using `Map.singleton`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each product has: id, name, price, description, and an image URL/path field.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend `Product` type uses `title` instead of `name`, so the specified field set is not implemented as requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Product listings page includes basic sorting or filtering controls (e.g., by price or name).
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of sorting/filtering controls is present in the provided diff summary; the `ProductListPage` implementation is not shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: UI references the generated asset paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (likely omitted as non-LLM-readable/binary).

hallucinated_features.description: Custom access control/authorization system with admin secret initialization (`_initializeAccessControlWithSecret`), permissions, and admin checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requires Internet Identity authentication and scoping carts/orders by principal; it does not request an additional access-control subsystem or admin token mechanism.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile feature (profile storage and a 'ProfileSetupModal' prompting for a name).
hallucinated_features.reason: User profiles are not part of the requested e-commerce scope (products/cart/checkout/orders/auth).

hallucinated_features.description: Product model includes `stock` and `createdAt` and provides `compareByCreatedAt` helper.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the product requirements (only id, name, price, description, image URL/path were specified).
